name: Badlands Beta
description:
Join The Battleground and fight against hords of mutades zombies in this post - apocalyptic world of madness.

Badlands is a online first person shooter game where you fight monsters to survive as many Waves as you can.

The game will get updated frequently with new maps, new weapons, bug fixes and much more.

NOTE: This is only in the alpha version of the game and you may find a lot of bugs, please leave us feedback to help me in the process of making this game.
